summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Gagan A J Portfolio website. All major features working correctly including: no reload loop, light theme applied (#f5f8ff), hero section with text-left/photo-right layout, Syne font, typewriter effect, navbar navigation, stats counters (6+, 4+, 5+, 8.0 CGPA), skills section (7 categories), AI Tools section (10 tools with status badges), GitHub Stats (gracefully handles unavailable), Projects (6 projects with filter tabs and modal), Timeline (3 education items), Certifications (2 with View Certificate/PDF links), Blog (3 articles with Coming Soon badges), Contact form, WhatsApp button, Footer, and mobile responsiveness.

issues: External GitHub stats images show 'Stats temporarily unavailable' - this is expected behavior when external GitHub API is unavailable, gracefully handled with fallback message

critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good with proper component structure
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Proper use of framer-motion for animations
Intersection observer used correctly for scroll-triggered animations
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. The portfolio is a frontend-only static site using React + Vite + Tailwind CSS. Contact form submits to Formspree (https://formspree.io/f/mvzbloel). GitHub stats images may show 'temporarily unavailable' when external service is down - this is handled gracefully. HMR is disabled in vite.config.js to prevent reload loops.

features_tested.no_reload_loop: PASS - Page loads without continuous refreshing
features_tested.light_theme: PASS - Background #f5f8ff, blue+teal accents, glassmorphism cards applied
features_tested.hero_section: PASS - Text left, photo right, Syne font, typewriter cycles roles
features_tested.navbar_sticky: PASS - All links scroll to correct sections
features_tested.navbar_social_icons: PASS - GitHub, LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook links correct
features_tested.about_section: PASS - Photo and bio displayed correctly
features_tested.skills_section: PASS - 7 categories: Programming, Visualization, Databases, Data Tools, Cloud, Core Skills, Soft Skills
features_tested.ai_tools_section: PASS - 10 tools across 4 groups with status badges
features_tested.github_stats_section: PASS - Renders with graceful unavailable message fallback
features_tested.projects_section: PASS - 6 projects, filter tabs work (All, Power BI, SQL, Python+SQL, IoT/AI)
features_tested.project_modal: PASS - Opens on click, image carousel works, GitHub link present
features_tested.certifications_section: PASS - 2 certificates with View Certificate and PDF links
features_tested.blog_section: PASS - 3 articles with Coming Soon badges
features_tested.contact_form: PASS - All fields (name, email, subject, phone, message) and submit button work
features_tested.footer: PASS - Social links and quick navigation links present
features_tested.mobile_responsiveness: PASS - Mobile menu works, all sections adapt correctly
